title: Somewear updated global satellite tracking, communication is more powerful & affordable
content:
We covered the launch of the Somewear Global Hotspot satellite tracker and emergency SOS beacon when it debuted a couple of years ago, but now Somewear has become more powerful and more accessible. Inside, the core satellite communication tech that powers the device hasn’t changed, but Somewear has boosted its capabilities through firmware & app […]

The post Somewear updated global satellite tracking, communication is more powerful & affordable appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
